Uses of ProgressListener in net.sf.opensftp.impl
 

Classes in net.sf.opensftp.impl that implement ProgressListener
 class AbstractProgressListener
          If you want to plug in ProgressListener module to net.sf.opensftp.impl.SftpUtil, your ProgressListener must extends this class.
 class PlainProgressListener
          A plain implementation of net.sf.opensftp.impl.AbstractProgressListener.
